main event: USAF personnel reported an unidentified flying object at March AFB, California on 11 October 1950.
interesting points: The object had a bright reddish glow and was observed moving at high speed., Witnesses described the object's movement as erratic, performing every known maneuver., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The object appeared to be at a very high altitude and emitted no sound., Several witnesses were uncertain whether the object was a star, planet, or balloon, dismissing those possibilities after observation.
